attributes.action: Theresa May should resign as she is not hearing from us
attributes.additional_details: In referendum about brexit it was only few percent more people going for it, should be at least 2/3 for it to be taking by government as people voice. Now she doesn't want hear even from parliament who took power from her and will decide today about brexit.
attributes.background: I am resident in UK and had a chance to sign petition to stop brexit (https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584). Millions of us signed it but government answer is only NO. It looks like Theresa May doesn't want to hear what we are saying.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign this petition instead:

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
